name: PressureWasher
0:
”Alexa open Pressure Washer”
”Alexa ask Pressure Washer to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pressure washer
des:
Transform your home into a zone of productivity with the Pressure Washer skill. The satisfying sound of high-pressure water jetting away dirt and grime is surprisingly calming and can motivate you to tackle your own cleaning projects or simply enjoy the sound of cleanliness in action.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Pressure Washer
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
